LGTM otherwise, thanks!

bors d+
Should this be `_root_.map_add`? Reading just the code, I cannot tell why this shouldn't have a `_root_`, but e.g. `map_smul` should. Same for the next three items.
You need `_root_.` here or `protected` on the deprecated lemma - either is enough to make lean pick up the correct declaration.

What do you think of making this `protected` at the same time? Will save us from removing a few `_root_` qualifiers.

```suggestion
protected theorem map_smul (r : R) (x : A‚ÇÅ) : e (r ‚Ä¢ x) = r ‚Ä¢ e x :=
```

idem:
```suggestion
protected theorem map_finsupp_sum {Œ± : Type*} [Zero Œ±] {Œπ : Type*} (f : Œπ ‚Üí‚ÇÄ Œ±) (g : Œπ ‚Üí Œ± ‚Üí A‚ÇÅ) :
```
